arts.ttl: Troy Deeney picks out ‘no desire’ Chelsea weak link in Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Former Premier League striker Troy Deeney has criticised Chelsea defender Levi Colwill for his role in Fulham's winner in the clash on Boxing Day. "Levi Colwill doesn’t even break into sprint and has no desire to get back.

arts.ttl: Silva insists Fulham deserved derby triumph
arts.sum: Fulham reaction. The post Silva insists Fulham deserved derby triumph appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Report: Enzo Maresca has made it clear he wants to keep Chelsea player who is yet to start in the Premier League
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has had the challenge of managing a large squad of Chelsea players who will all feel like they are good enough to start...

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer admits Chelsea ‘lost control’ in rare Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Cole Palmer admitted that Chelsea “lost a bit of control” as they fell to a late defeat to Fulham at Stamford Bridge on Boxing Day. The England international put the Blues in front early on with a superb strike, but the hosts couldn’t hold on to their lead as impact substitute Harry Wilson equalised in […] The post Cole Palmer admits Chelsea ‘lost control’ in rare Fulham defeat first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: 'Silva's rehabilitation complete with historic Fulham win'
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva's reputation has not simply been restored at Fulham, it has been enhanced after a historic win at Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Chelsea given fresh Premier League title verdict ahead of Arsenal despite Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Chelsea are still the next in line for the Premier League title, ahead of Arsenal, according to pundit Steve Sidwell. The comments come despite the Blues' Premier League defeat to Fulham on Boxing Day. Chelsea initially led at Stamford Bridge courtesy of a composed finish from Cole Palmer in the first half.

arts.ttl: Chelsea's next five fixtures compared to title rivals Liverpool and Arsenal after Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Chelsea have dropped points in a second consecutive Premier League game after they were beaten by Fulham at Stamford Bridge on Boxing Day. With a busy run of games to come, football.london have taken a look at the upcoming fixtures for the Blues in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer reveals what Enzo Maresca did straight after Chelsea's late defeat to Fulham
arts.sum: Chelsea have hit a mini slump in their season after losing on Boxing Day at home to Fulham. Chelsea were beaten 2-1 by local rivals...

arts.ttl: Chelsea asked transfer question over star labelled ‘embarrassing’ after Fulham defeat
arts.sum: Although Marc Cucurella has silenced many of his critics with some fine performances this season, the left-back was the weak link as Chelsea lost to their London rivals. Cucurella got a FootballCritic rating of just 5.8 against Fulham, which put him square as the worst player on the field.

arts.ttl: Chelsea star was AXED from squad for Fulham defeat by furious Enzo Maresca
arts.sum: Noni Madueke missed Chelsea's 2-1 London derby defeat to Fulham at Stamford Bridge on Boxing Day, dropped from the squad after his performances in training, according to his manager
